Merge pull request #147 from yaokaige/develop

Fix Xcode7 compile error
Fix Xcode7 compile error: Absolute value function 'fabsf' given an argument of type 'double' but has parameter of type 'float' which may cause truncation of value

Not import header files which have already imported indirectly.

Thus Doxygen can generate more clearer include dependency graph.
[InkpadDoxygen](https://github.com/rhcad/InkpadDoxygen) is a generator example using Doxygen.
Set the <g> Layer ID to the Inkpad layer name. #90

Fix issue with `none` align parameter of preserveAspectRatio.

none - Do not force uniform scaling. If `align` is none, then the optional `meetOrSlice` value is ignored.
Add new contributor.
Update changes.
Integrate Japanese localization.

Merge pull request #105 from akiji/JapaneseLocalization

add help/index_ja.html and ja.lproj/*
Xcode updated project settings.
Fix an issue that could occur when outlining a stroke. It was possible for the start node to be removed incorrectly in -[WDPath simplify].
Fix typo: TureType -> TrueType
Fix compilation errors.

Merge pull request #100 from rhcad/chinese

Add Chinese Simplified translation by xiezhhw and rhcad.
Translate the help page into Chinese by xiezhhw and rhcad.

Add Chinese Simplified translation.

Require alphabetic keyboard for Openclipart search.
Update change log.
Add new contributors.
Adjust spark sliders to better accommodate localizations.
Shrink panel width a bit.

Merge pull request #91 from bomberstudios/bomberstudios/spanish-tweaks

Some tweaks to existing translations, and a couple of missing ones.
Some tweaks to existing translations, and a couple of missing ones.
Update Spanish strings. Tweak UI elements to fit.
Clear temp directory contents at launch.
Loading spinner should stop if there are no search results.
Bump version number to 1.6.
Set the maximum grid spacing to half the maximum drawing size.
Fix language code.
Add Brazilian Portuguese localization (courtesy of Pedro Lovisoto).
Add new German strings.
Increase the maximum allowable pasted/imported image size.
Don't send notifications when closing quietly. Fixes issue #89.
Delete the downloaded file in the error case (not just in the success case).
Don't crash when importing an empty SVG.
Add basic support for handling forward references in gradients (only handles one level of indirection). Fixes issue #81.
Merge latest French strings.
Add Portuguese localizations for new interface strings.
When generating a bitmap for the drawing, use a maximum area instead of a maximum dimension.
[FIX] typo
European Portuguese should use pt_PT.lproj.
Add missing @.
Add Italian localizations for new interface strings.
[UPDATE] French translation
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/develop' into develop
Add new localizations to change log.
Add new contributors.
Generate guides for all unselected objects and the current selection bounds (rather than every selected object).
Add Portuguese localization (from Delfim Rodrigues).
Access properties more consistently.
Don't show the activity spinner when clearing the search results.
Handle simultaneous identical imports gracefully.
Automatically load the next page of data when scrolling in the Openclipart controller.
Escape Openclipart URLs.
Embiggen samples panel to better accommodate German localization.
Merge latest German strings.
Generalize dynamic guide implementation. The shape creation tool now supports guide snapping.
Latest additions to change log.
Expand settings panel size since there's a new entry for Dynamic Guides.
Extend dynamic guide snapping to node anchors.
Allow floating palettes to maintain their relative screen position when rotating the device. Issue #80.
Tweak Add Anchor Tool to match expected behavior described in Issue #72.
Outlined strokes should take their style from the parent path, not the active style. Applicable when more than one path is selected.
Add licensing info.
Increase maximum grid size.
Implement support for dynamic alignment guides when moving objects. Implements Issue #14.
Prevent crash at launch if the gallery contains 0 drawings.
Use a default gradient when passed an empty stop array.
Increase the maximum logical drawing dimension to 16K (but constrain generated bitmaps to 4K).
Add a 'delete' pseudo-tool to the palette.
Add German localization to the project. Fix typo.

Merge pull request #75 from number-six/develop

german translation (3 parts)
Remove color setting code that assumes current context. Originally pointed out in a patch by 32Beat.
Fix SVG import crasher.
Fix formatting.
Merge branch 'SVG' of https://github.com/32Beat/Inkpad into 32Beat-SVG
Tweak Openclipart sort mode names.
Updated change log.
Add support for importing SVGs from Openclipart.com. Checkpoint.
parts of Localizable.strings translated

Small things

Transated the first small files into german, more to follow
Fix type bug that broke palette 'tossing' on 64-bit devices.
Tweak line attribute picker appearance. Make the non-selected state more visible.
Increase the maximum stroke width to 300.
Add parameter types to forward declarations so that the compiler catches future type errors.
Merge branch 'develop'. Release 1.5.2.
Update change log.
Fix type error that could introduce NaNs when curve fitting.
Text path start bar should respect view scale. Fixes Issue #68.
Use WDBezierSegmentCalculatePointAtT() to eliminate some code.
Fix text path layout issues. Text on straight path segments was not rendering correctly.
Fix text rendering issues in outline mode. The style bounds need to include the entire rendered area (which is larger in outline mode). Fixes Issue #65.
Fix crash showing help (Issue #64).
Update change log.
Make sure closed paths have a smooth join.
Simplify curve fitting code and remove a lot of unnecessary dependencies. The implementation is now derived from a single source file from the original Graphics Gems code (public domain).
Tweak values.
Update change log.
Increase the maximum drawing dimensions to 4096x4096.
Bump version number.
Add a new tool to create closed freehand shapes. We might want to process the points a bit differently before smoothing, but this seems ok for a first pass.
Widen some view controllers a bit to better accommodate French localization.

Typo changes
[UPDATE] minor typo
[UPDATE] shorten 'Polices de caractère' => 'Police'
Font panel title should not be plural.
Start the fill transform in the center for radial gradients. Fixes Issue #43.
Remove stray period.

[ADD] Turkish Translation
Don't unnecessarily reload the typeface table.
The font panel was not updating correctly if none of the selected elements inspected the font property.
Fix issues with user installed fonts. Needed to update the family map when they were added or deleted.
Lighten appearance of text alignment icons.

[UPDATE] French Translation

Fix for CTFontRef leak in WDFontManager.m
Fix for CTFontRef leak in WDFontManager.m
More crash reports from iTunes Connect.
Updated change log.
Table row heights should match.
Merge branch 'samgreen-fonts_sorted' into develop
Move text alignment into the nav bar.
Use a slightly different heuristic for determining the default font for a family. Assume shorter names are more likely to be the 'regular' version.
Font panel improvements and bug fixes.
[ADD] French Translation
Merge samgreen-fonts_sorted.
Update change log.
Add import from photo album to the gallery (issue #18).

Merge pull request #35 from alistairmcmillan/AddSVGDocumentType

Add SVG to list of document types.
Add SVG to list of document types.
Updated change log and added new contributor to README.
Add es.lproj to the project.

Merge pull request #33 from migdus/develop_es_localization

Spanish localizable strings added
Spanish localizable strings added
Corrections to Italian strings.
Fix typo.
Updated list of contributors. Modified license section.
Add support for localizing in-app Help. Add Italian Help localizaton.
Latest string changes.
Minor header cleanup.

Merge pull request #29 from alistairmcmillan/AddingUIDocumentInteractionController

Adding support for standard sharing panel for Issue #19
Caught a few more places where unit abbreviations need to be localized.
Fix issues with page orientation and unit localization.
More string updates.
Latest string changes.
Add more Italian localizations.
Localize blend mode name.
Localize default drawing name prefix.
Don't expand the fill segment control (to accommodate languages with longer text than English).
Add support for localizing strings in plists.
Add support for localization in xibs that require it.
Change folder for temporary file exports from a folder within NSHomeDirectory to NSTemporaryDirectory.
Removing pre-existing "Email as..." options now that they are offered through UIDocumentInteractionController.
Add some string localizations that were missed.
Remove unneeded string from the loading activity view.
First pass at Italian localization.
First pass at adding support for standard sharing panel.
Add more crash reports from iTunes Connect.
Tighten spacing on UI. Fixed vertical bounds for WDCoreTextLabels
UI changes to reduce massive WDFontController size.
Update change log.
Move common options view configuration into WDTool. Fixes incorrect shadow/parallax settings on eraser options.
Updated WDFontController to use split view UI.
Added helper methods for Font Families.
Updated UI to use two UITableViews in a split view configuration for Font Picking.

Merge pull request #24 from samgreen/t_arrow_heads

Added T shaped terminators as a new type of WDArrowHead
Made use of flipTransform for T shaped arrow heads to prevent holes with transparent strokes. Additionally updated the attachment point for T shaped arrow heads.
Add Crash Reports from iTunes Connect.

Added a BOOL viewByFamily to determine the current viewing mode of the WDFontController. We may want to merge these changes instead to a WDFontFamiliesController just for clarity. This version is working but doesn’t have a clean separation of concerns.

Added supportedFamilies, userFamilyMap, and systemFamilyMap to support sorting by font family. Additionally added the fontsInFamily utility method. The supportedFamilies method returns all families including those from user fonts.
Added familyName property to WDUserFont.
Added a check for fontRef in the dealloc method as it can be over released if it was never set.
UI Changes to support Families in the FontController.
Added T shaped terminators as a new type of WDArrowHead
Merge branch 'develop'. Release 1.5.1.
Previously over-simplified point finding code. Have to split the path to ensure the found point is exactly on the path.
Merge branch 'develop'
Simplify logic.
Fix issues with edge snapping on straight path segments.
Bump version number to 1.5.1.
Update change log.
Add support for a butt cap adjustment on arrowhead attachments.
Stop leaking documents when importing.
Export arrowheads to SVG.
The 'none' arrow is now represented by an empty string.
Pass a nil completion handler instead of constructing an empty one.
Tweak arrowhead attachment points.
If we can't fit both arrowheads, don't place either of them.
Fixed a looping error that could cause misplaced arrows.
Updated change log.
Enable support for arm64. Fix build errors. Integrate latest Dropbox SDK.
Increase slider resolution at small stroke widths by interpreting the slider's value non-linearly.
Make the stroke width label text black and slightly larger.
Stop leaking the stroke path.
The marquee should not snap to the grid.
Merge branch 'arrows' into develop
Arrowheads should stop at the end of a path instead of shooting past.
Tweak base arrowhead size.
Support arrowheads on compound paths.
Tweak arrowhead sizes and clean up path generation a bit.
Remove arrows from the defaults when the stroke is turned off.
Integrate arrowheads when outlining a stroke.
Ignore arrowheads on the active stroke style when creating certain kinds of paths.
When reversing a path, swap arrowheads, if any. Also, stop using nil to represent 'none' dashes and arrowheads.
Fix crash that occurred when erasing a path with arrowheads.
Don't encode 'none' arrows.
Tweak arrow appearance on non-retina displays.
Implement arrowhead picker.
Add arrowhead button to the stroke panel. Checkpoint.
Implement support for arrowheads. Checkpoint.
Tweak appearance.
Added 'How to Contribute' section.
Add a change log.
Wrap some strings in NSLocalizedString().
Don't reset gradient transforms if they've been modified from the default.
Fix broken link in help.
Initial public commit.
